definition.text: Liquidity Programs reward the provision of liquidity for the Superalgos Token on decentralized exchanges. Providing liquidity is a valuable contribution to the community. It supports the token's reputation and price stability.

paragraphs.text: Decentralized exchanges allow to provide liquidity to the Superalgos Token. The token is paired into a liquidity pool with another asset. This enables interested buyers to trade the paired tokens against each other.
The Community currently rewards these liquidity pools on Binance Smart Chain (BSC):
Liquidity pools at these decentralized exchanges are currently rewarded:
Only PancakeSwap holds liquidity pools for all supported assets. On Biswap, you will find a pool for SA/BNB, while 1inch holds a SA/BTCB pool.
If the Superalgos Token is not automatically found at the exchange of your choice, you can add it by using its token address: 0xfb981ed9a92377ca4d75d924b9ca06df163924fd

For providing liquidity, you are rewarded with tokens from a Liquidity Rewards Pool. There is a decicated Rewards Pool for every asset supported in the Program. The share of reward tokens you receive from the Rewards Pool is proportional to the share you are holding of the Liquidity Pool for the asset.
Click "Add Liquidity Program" and spawn one Liquidity Program node for each asset (BTCB, BNB...) you have pooled at supported exchanges.
Liquidity Programs do not require Token Power.
